title: भारत का एक पुराना मैप कोरोना वायरस से निपटने के लिए प्रधानमंत्री मोदी की तारीफ़ करते हुए शेयर हो रहा है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Thanks @SMHoaxSlayer. Actually, this image was created by me using MS paint, for a Quora answer 8 years ago : https://t.co/P0hOICcdZD. Back when I used to have too much time on my hand.

 I am flattered that ppl think that American CEOs spend their time doing this kind of shit. 😂
